      • tick

        public boolean tick(double x,
                    double y,
                    boolean clicked)
        Ticks the button per frame. Checks every frame if the button has been clicked, and returns true if it has been clicked.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of mouse
        y - Y position of mouse
        clicked - If the mouse is clicked
        Returns:
        boolean if the mouse was clicked on the button
